description: Served in 1st Commando Battalion as a Commando Medic. Trained to provide emergency care and triage during both training and operational missions, demonstrating the ability to perform under high-stress conditions.

Helped supervisor to research, design, and experiment on microfluidic chips for drug delivery applications. Collected and analysed experimental data, optimised chip designs, and contributed to the development of innovative solutions for precise drug administration. Assisted in documenting results and refining experimental processes to improve design accuracy and efficiency.

Prepared and served bubble tea beverages in a high-demand, fast-paced environment. Gained hands-on experience in drink preparation, quality control, and efficient service. Developed strong customer service skills, teamwork, and the ability to stay composed under pressure.
